DOC.brief_summary: This study will determine the maximum dose of LCI6999 with respect to effect on the ACTH-stimulated cortisol response in patients with hypertension
DOC.brief_title: An Evaluation of the Effects of LCI699 on Cortisol in Patients With Hypertension
